(2,): As a Developer, I want to log an issue, so that I can keep track of problems that need addressing As a Developer, I want to prevent duplicate publication of submissions, so that there are no conflicting entries in the system As a Developer, I want to clarify error codes, so that I can provide accurate information regarding issues As a DevOps Engineer, I want to monitor application data, so that I can ensure system performance and stability As a System Administrator, I want to add users to the system, so that I can manage access and roles effectively
